feed.title: Women and Gender eXpansive Coders DC
feed.subtitle: Women and Gender eXpansive Coders DC aims to provide a community where women and non-binary members feel empowered to express their learnings, share their experiences, and expand their technical skills.

author.name: Women and Gender eXpansive Coders DC

entry.title: Donate to WGXC
entry.content: Did you know that WGXC is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit? Your donation helps us continue to offer programming to our community, free of charge. Please consider making a tax-deductible donation today.

author.name: Women and Gender eXpansive Coders DC

entry.summary: Did you know that WGXC is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit? Your donation helps us continue to offer programming to our community, free of charge. Please consider making a tax-deductible donation today.

entry.title: Submit a Talk Proposal
entry.content:
Interested in sharing your ideas or practicing your public speaking in front of a supportive audience? WGXC DC hosts regular lightning talks online and in-person, and we want to hear from you. Please submit your talk proposal here! Submissions are reviewed on a rolling basis. You may resubmit or submit multiple proposals at any time.

Thanks for being a part of our community!

author.name: Women and Gender eXpansive Coders DC
